test-suite.name: tests/core/pfstate/test_slice_state.py
test-suite.label: Test if slice attributes works properly with portfolio state.

test-case.name: tests/core/pfstate/test_slice_state.py::test_state_slice_whole[2022-MS]
test-case.label: Test that slicing splits the pfl in 2 non-overlapping pieces without gap (i.e., ensure that each original timestamp is in exactly one of the resulting pieces.)
